siteMetadata.title: Ghost Docs
siteMetadata.description: Everything you need to know about working with the Ghost professional publishing platform.

frontmatter.title: Tensorflow Concepts
frontmatter.meta_description: This tutorial is used for going through tensorflow concepts

markdownRemark.html:
Differences between variable and placeholder

Variable often is used to represent weight and bias of neural network training

weights = tf.Variable(
    tf.truncated_normal([IMAGE_PIXELS, hidden1_units],
                    stddev=1.0 / math.sqrt(float(IMAGE_PIXELS))), name='weights')
 biases = tf.Variable(tf.zeros([hidden1_units]), name='biases')
markdownRemark.excerpt: Differences between variable and placeholderVariable often is used to represent weight and bias of neural network training
